The 7.62x51 variant of the series of rifles developed by IWI (Israel Weapon Industries).

 Although based upon the IMI Galils of old, these new ACE variants feature better ergonomics and accuracy due to their integration of steel with polymer instead of using a machined solid steel billet action.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] · %c[ui_gray_2] All scopes and collimators that are attachable on a picatinny rail.
Installation of a heavier barrel to improve recoil further
Installation of a Cheek Piece on the Stock for more comfortable aiming. Could reduce the recoil while aiming significantly.
Rechambers the gun to a calibre more commonly available in the zone.
